employee_id.notes: Employee ID mapped to userId field in SAP SuccessFactors EmployeeTime schema

absence_type_external_id.notes: Absence type mapped to timeType field in SAP SuccessFactors EmployeeTime schema

start_date.notes: Start date mapped to startDate in SAP SuccessFactors (Date format: /Date(timestamp)/)

end_date.notes: End date mapped to endDate in SAP SuccessFactors (Date format: /Date(timestamp)/)

start_half_day.notes: Logical: Option 1 - fractionQuantity: if true set to 0.5, if false set to 1.0. Option 2 - startTime: if true set to PT00H00M00S (start of day), if false set to PT12H00M00S (midday).

end_half_day.notes: Logical: Option 1 - fractionQuantity: if true set to 0.5, if false set to 1.0. Option 2 - endTime: if true set to PT12H00M00S (midday), if false set to PT23H59M59S (end of day).

amount.notes: Amount mapped to quantityInDays for Day(s) units or quantityInHours for Hour(s) units based on TimeType.unit from AvailableTimeType lookup

unit.notes: Logical: lookup unit (Day(s)/Hour(s)) from AvailableTimeType.unit field for given timeType value

employee_note.notes: Employee note mapped to comment field in SAP SuccessFactors EmployeeTime schema

status.reason: Status is managed by SAP workflow system and not settable during creation
status.api_limitation: Field available in response only (approvalStatus) - managed by workflow

api_analysis_notes.half_day_logic: Option 1 - fractionQuantity: 0.5 for half-day, 1.0 for full-day. Option 2 - startTime/endTime: PT00H00M00S (start), PT12H00M00S (midday), PT23H59M59S (end of day)
api_analysis_notes.unit_logic: Lookup unit from AvailableTimeType.unit field based on timeType value
api_analysis_notes.amount_logic: Use quantityInDays for Day(s) units, quantityInHours for Hour(s) units based on TimeType.unit
api_analysis_notes.workflow_notes: SAP manages status through workflow system - not directly settable
api_analysis_notes.time_format: SAP uses PT15H51M04S format for times (ISO 8601 duration)
key_insights: userId is the actual employee identifier, not EmployeeTime_externalCode
timeType is the correct field for absence type, not TimeType_externalCode
fractionQuantity is the primary field for half-day logic
startTime/endTime provide precise timing control for half-day logic
Unit must be derived from AvailableTimeType lookup based on timeType
